title: Tormented
overview: The award winning team of Jonathan Morgan and Stormy Daniels get together for a more sinister side of seduction. This is a look at the darker side of Stormy, one that hides beneath her normally cheerful exterior. Fantasies of domination, submission and other sexually altered states. Where reality takes a back seat to the perverted passions deep within her mind. Join us and prepare to be Tormented...
